name: 0% Spiced Rum Bundle - With Mixers
description: A rum lover? This 0% spiced rum bundle has you covered paired with ginger mixers to make a gorgeous Non-Alcoholic Mule. Full sized bottle MYTH Spiced Cane 0% Spirit 4x bottles all natural Ginger Beer by Navas

name: 24x Bottles MATCH Tonic Water | Premium Tonic
description: This classic and incredibly sophisticated tonic is crisp and complex designed to elevate your non-alcoholic spirits. 24x 200ml Bottles | Naturally Low In Sugar (4.9g per 100ml) Flavour profile. Aromatic lemongrass, vibrant grapefruit and a touch of juniper. Recommended Spirit Pairings. Botanical based non-alc spirit (gin alternative). Citrus based non-alc spirits such as bittersweet aperitif's or alternative spirits with lemon, orange, grapefruits Agave based non-alc spirit (tequila alternative). Cocktail Recommendations. Spritz. 50ml Aperitif (Wilfred's, Pentire Coastal, Rebels Dolce) topped with MATCH Tonic over ice in a wine glass and a juicy wedge of orange. Paloma. 50ml Pentire Adrift, 25ml Freshly Squeezed Grapefruit over ice in a tall glass topped with MATCH Tonic & garnished with a wedge of grapefruit. G&T. 50ml Non-Alc Gin over ice topped with MATCH Tonic. Choose the chosen garnish for that spirit.

name: 4x Mixed Natural Cocktail Cordials - Small-Batch Handmade
description: These all natural cordials are made using whole fruit in small batches - handmade especially for your order. Use in cocktails to add a touch of natural sweetness or balance with citrus. 1x Bottle of Apple & Elderflower, Bottle of Whole Lime, Bottle of Berry Lemon and Bottle of Whole Orange. Serving suggestions: serve with hot, still, sparkling or tonic water or add to experiment in cocktails.

name: 6x Bottles Alcohol-Free Mulled Wine - Eisberg - Award Winner
description: Eisberg returns this festive season with their alcohol-free Mulled Wine. Perfect to warm up and make for your guests alongside a mince pie, or to add to your alcohol-free spirits for a festive twist. Tasting notes: intense spice and dried fruit aromas with touches of orange peel. Take to a festive drinks pop in at a friends house or make at home to make your house smell like Christmas! Prefer your drinks cold? Serve over ice with your favourite festive garnishes (sprig of Christmas tree, fresh slices of orange and a cinnamon stick) for a longer serve.

name: Alcohol-Free Whiskey - Rebels Malt Blend - DECEMBER'S FT SPIRIT
description: Intense notes of oak and vanilla created using a double distilled method for maximum, bold flavour. Tasting notes: Smooth oak reminiscent of aged wooden barrels, balanced by sweet vanilla, dark dried fruits, creamy caramel and a gentle kick for a satisfying finish. How to serve: Use in your whiskey based cocktails such as a whiskey sour and an old fashioned. or simply with a cola or ginger beer. Natural Botanicals | Vegan | Double Distilled | Alcohol-Free

name: Alcohol Free Sober October Spirit Bundle
description: Sip your way into Autumn with this hand curated wine bundle made for those cosier, crisper days and evenings. A great way to discover a variety of different flavour profiles to bring your 'wine moment' to any occasion. What‚Äôs inside? Full sized bottle of L.A Brewery Sparkling English Blush | 750ml. Lightly fermented sencha green tea, blended with strawberry, rhubarb & floral hops. Full sized bottle of by ViSecco Pinot by Jorg Geiger | 750ml. Dominated by fresh acidity, characterised by red currants, harmoniously rounded out by mild notes of Pinot Meunier. Full sized bottle of Cuv√©e No.23 by Jorg Geiger. Vanilla and fresh apple, lasting acerbity of oxalis and sorrel. Full sized bottle of DIVIN Blanc de Blancs - Sparkling Chenin. Crisp bubbles, with delicate liveliness, generous length and aromatic complexity. The perfect Champagne alternative. Delivery included.

name: Bittersweet Orange & Rosemary Aperitif - Wilfred's
description: An all year round classic. Serve as a Spritz simply with tonic or soda, savour in a Negroni or create a seasonal mule with ginger beer. Wilfred‚Äôs is a winner, always. Tasting notes: perfectly bittersweet with natural rosemary, bitter orange, rhubarb and subtle clove. 0 alcohol, allergens, artificial favours, sweeteners and colours. V and low in calories Serving suggestions: Spritz: 50ml with tonic or soda water and a wedge of orange. Negroni: 70ml with 50ml Pentire Adrift and a slice of orange. Mule: 50ml topped with ginger beer and a slice of lime.

name: Build Your Own Alcohol-Free Cocktail Box
description: Everything a JOMO Box is about..with a little less of the surprise. Hey, not everyone likes surprises, that‚Äôs okay, we have you covered. Just select which type of spirit you would like and we will pair with the best mixers and garnishes for that spirit. Full sized bottle of alcohol-free spirit Mixers and garnishes to pair Ready-to-drink cocktails Snacks Postage

name: Christmas Pudding Spirit | Christmas Limited Edition Special | Alcohol
description: A festive must have & a sell out every year! A blend of complex flavours and botanicals. Indulgent, sweet, spiced - Christmas pudding in a glass (without the chewy fruit). Tasting notes: hints of dark fruits, vanilla & ginger. 70cl bottle. How to make an alcohol-free Bailey's. Shake 50ml with 50ml cream over ice. Serves: Simply serve over ice. Serve in a tall glass over ice with ginger beer for a fiery, longer serve. Create a mulled cocktail gently heated with warm apple juice. Bakes: Use in baking such as your Christmas puddings, brandy cream, mince pies or festive Tiramisu.

name: Citrus Non-Alc Spirit - CROSSIP Fresh Citrus Spirit
description: The brightest creation in the CROSSIP non-alcoholic spirit collection and the spirit you didn't know you needed, until now. Super versatile and incredibly refreshing while being complex at the same time. Tasting Notes: opening with mandarin and eucalyptus, this spirit then evolves into different layers of citrus including orange, lemon & grapefruit for a complex sipping journey. Finishing with subtle ginger and bitterness for a long lasting finish Serving Suggestions: simply serve with tonic or soda water for a spritz. Serve in a 0% Mojito or Cosmo.

name: Coconut Cane Non-Alcoholic Spirit - Malibu Alternative - MYTH Drinks
description: This one is for the coconut/malibu lovers. MYTH Drinks' take on a Malibu and members just love it. Tasting notes: naturally flavoured with coconut, expect a sweet coconut spirit that also has notes of peach and Serving suggestions: serve over ice or use in tropical Malibu cocktails such as Pina Colada's or rum punch.

name: Corporate Gifting Package - Alcohol-Free Gifting For Clients or Your T
description: This corporate gifting package is fully customised to select your preferred items and package. Why gift JOMO? Show your gratitude and spread JOY this Christmas to your clients or team so they can raise a glass this Christmas and feel inspired by the drinks they discover. Inclusive, flavour first & crafted with love every single time. About the products: Each item focuses on premium, quality, flavour first artisan brands that aren't found on supermarket shelves for the perfect alcohol-free gift. Delivery: If you need your packages sent to different locations, please do drop us an email and we can change this for you as required. We can also change dates to a delivery time that suits you best. We hope you choose JOMO this season for a Christmas to remember. More options: If you have a personalised request, please do let us know. We are a small brand that can pivot and customise to your needs.

name: Dark Spiced Cane Alcohol-Free Spirit - MYTH Drinks
description: An alcohol-free take on a classic spiced rum, so close to its alcoholic counterpart it‚Äôs astonishing. Tasting Notes: A balance of sweet and spicy with notes of sweet molasses, fiery ginger and black pepper. Serving Suggestions: any classic spiced rum drink such as a rum and coke (Cuba Libre), an Espresso Martini, Rum & Ginger Beer or over ice.

name: Date Night Box of Love üíå Non-Alcoholic Cocktails ‚ô•Ô∏è
description: There is something that makes us feel far more relaxed when we have a drink in hand. But it turns out, it is mostly about the glassware, ritual and flavour of the drink over the booze. This box is designed to enjoy together. Those who discover together, stay together.. I think that is the quote? Date night idea. Why don't you make 3 cards for 3 cocktails and score each one. Do you have the same favourite or do you have completely different tastes? What's Included? A date night themed box for a night of connection filled with a full sized bottle of 0% spirit, 6 drinks to pair with it & drink solo, plus garnishes & snacks. Look away now if you want a surprise! Full Sized Bottle Non-Alc Spirit - Wilfred Aperitif Twelve Below - Rhubarb Tonic UMRI - Jamine Navas Drinks - Light Tonic Nuisance - Bramble & Raspberry Chapmans - Orange Bitters Sparkling Pentire's Ready To Drink Paloma Cocktail Garnishes & Snacks Serves 50ml Wilfred's over ice in a rocks glass topped with Rhubarb Tonic, Light Tonic Nuisance Bramble or Chapmans. All can be enjoyed with Wilfred's or can be enjoyed solo too. Salt rim a 2 glasses and divide the cold Paloma between them.

name: DIVIN | Premium Vigneron Sparkling Chenin | FT JOMO WINE CLUB
description: France ‚Ä¢ Loire ‚Ä¢ Chenin Blanc This beautiful Blanc De Blanc is carefully crafted from Chenin Blanc harvested at optimal ripeness. Aged with care, partly in large oak barrels from the Brouard forest. A sparkling expression of Chenin Blanc's purity. Aroma: Pear, peach and green apple with subtle vanilla and caramel from oak aging. Palate: Crisp bubbles, with delicate liveliness, generous length, and aromatic complexity. Food pairing: Fresh white fish or lemon meringue tartlet. DIVIN is recognised for the quality of its alcohol-free wines, both in France and internationally. We are currently distributed in 40+ countries and growing. DIVIN is the Loire Valley alcohol-free leading producer

name: Autumn's Alcohol-Free Drinks Bundle - Hand-Curated For Cosy Sips
description: A specially curated bundle to keep you feeling inspired, and extra cosy with an array of Autumnal sips. Cosy up in front of the fire, enjoy with a hearty dinner or embrace Autumn with friends. This package has you covered for all occasions. 1x Full Sized Bottle Mother Root Alcohol-Free Spirit. Zingy ginger, mellow blossom honey and a touch of chilli for some added warmth. The perfect drink for any time of the day. Shot in the morning for a natural wake up. Serve with sparkling or hot water at lunch for a healthy sip or enjoy with tonic water and ice for an evening wind down. 1x Full Sized Bottle Rebels Dolce Spritz. Bitter Orange & Sweet Rhubarb bringing all the colours of Autumn to your glass. Serve over ice in a seasonal glass with tonic, lemonade or soda and a big wedge of orange. Add a splash of alcohol-free bubbly for an extra special serve. Create a lighter Negroni using this spirit. 2x Bottles. L.A Brewery Citrus. Refreshing and crisp, just like those crisp Autumnal days. Serve cold. 1x Full Sized Bottle The Pathfinder Alcohol-Free Elixir. Hemp & Root for an early, unique and incredibly exciting spirit. This spirit stands strong with all mixers. Perfect with ginger beer, cola or even in coffee cocktails.

name: Autumnal Alcohol-Free Cosy Bundle - Hand-Curated For Cosy Season

Serve over ice in a wine glass with tonic, lemonade, soda or 0% bubbly for an Autumn spritz - garnish with a cinnamon stick. 1x Rebels Dolce Spritz Alcohol-Free Spirit Serve with a premium tonic or any citrus based mixer over ice and a wedge of orange or clementine 1x MYTH Spiced Cane Alcohol-Free Spirit Serve with ginger beer, cola, in Espresso Martinis or any dark rum cocktail 1x Crossip Dandy Smoke Alcohol-Free Spirit Serve 20ml (not a double measure as packs a punch) with ginger beer and a squeeze of lime

name: Autumnal Cocktail Box - For The Adventurous Drinker - Bold Flavours
description: 2025's Limited Edition JOMO Box is here & available to order! Once this exclusive box is gone, they won't be back. There will only be one limited edition box this year, and we promise, you will want to get in on the action! FOMO for JOMO is a real thing. "Super high quality and delicious blends. I felt super special and taste buds activated. Soooo good. Highly recommend. The alcohol-free spirit is just sublime" When will it be sent? You will receive your orders within 2-3 days. What is this box & why was it created? With tastes becoming more adventurous as we no longer look for 'any old alternative to alcohol', but a 'sophisticated, bold, powerful, rebellious, adventurous alternative', this box brings together all of those things. Bold flavours. Brand new launches. Exciting, innovative drinks that aren't afraid to raise the bar but instead set them. You won't find these drinks in a monthly JOMO discovery box - they are a step more adventurous. Who is this box for? For the adventurous drinker. When you want to find things that really excite the palate. Drinks that become a talking point and the heart of conversation! Drinks you won't have yet tried. Why should I buy this box? This is different to any other box JOMO has done before. Think even bolder flavours. More daring products. Alcohol-free drinks that haven't existed before, until now. We have a limited number and once they are gone, they will be gone forever. SPOILERS BELOW - DON'T GO FURTHER IF YOU WANT YOUR DELIVERY TO BE A SURPRISE... What is inside this box? Full sized bottle of The Pathfinder Hemp & Root Non-Alc Spirit. Counter Culture Mango, Ginger & Lime Kombucha. Good Koffee - Sparkling Coffee Inspired By Travel. 20cl bottle of Three Spirits Social Elixir Agua De Madre Water Kefir Navas Ginger Garnishes & 20 Page Special Edition Magazine Shipping

name: Everleaf Mountain Floral Aperitif - SEPTEMBER'S FEATURED SPIRIT
description: Vibrant and aromatic , this spirit will take you on a journey with premium botanicals including elegant cherry blossom and strawberry to bittersweet rosehip. Tasting Notes: well balanced, complex and long lasting with savoury cherry blossom, sweet strawberry and bittersweet rosehip. A perfect pink gin or aperitif spirit. Serving Suggestions: Simply serve in a spritz with tonic, lemonade or tonic and garnished with berries.

name: Feragaia 70cl | Dark Distilled Botanical Non-Alc Spirit | Made In Scot
description: Inspired by, crafted & distilled in Fife, Scotland on Feragaia's farm. Using a balanced blend of responsibly sourced wild, natural 12 land & sea botanicals including: bay, blackcurrant leaf and chamomile combined with earthier root botanicals such as ginger, liquorice and spices. Tasting notes: Earthy, wild, complex and sophisticated flavour that allows you to sip and savour. Earthy notes and gentle spice. Serving suggestions: serve simply with tonic or a premium lemonade. Serve with ginger ale or use in a Paloma with a grapefruit soda.

name: Festive & Dry January Boxes - 2 Month Non-Alcoholic Cocktail Delivery
description: Give the gift that keeps on giving this year for a Christmas to remember. Two whole months of JOMO Club boxes filled with seasonal non-alcoholic drinks, cocktails, mixers, snacks, garnishes and a printed magazine with recipes. What's Included? December JOMO Box. A full sized bottle of non-alcoholic spirit, 5+ mixers / ready-to-drink cocktails, 2x snacks, garnishes & a printed members magazine. Dry January JOMO Box. A box designed to inspire those not drinking or cutting back as we kick off 2025. All drinks will be seasonal and great for January sipping. A full sized bottle of non-alcoholic spirit, 5+ mixers / ready-to-drink cocktails, 2x snacks, garnishes & a printed members magazine. Delivery. The 1st box will be delivered around the 19th December, however please let us know if you have a preferred date and we will do our best to accommodate. The January Box will be sent beginning of January.

name: Festive Alcohol-Free Drinks Bundle - Hand-Curated For Seasonal Sipping
description: A specially curated bundle to keep you feeling inspired & full of joy throughout the entire festive season - all with a full glass! Whether you are looking for a dinner party sip, drinks to make for your guests, an evening in front of the fire or on Christmas day, this package has you covered for all occasions. 1x Full Sized Bottle Rebels ROSSO Alcohol-Free Spirit. A bold aperitivo with bitter gentian and bergamot notes. Serve simply over ice for a Negroni. Top with tonic water for a bitter serve, or lift with a lemonade. Or serve with a sparkling alcohol-free wine 1x Full Sized Bottle Rebels Malt Blend Spritz. Enjoy on its own or with your favourite dark spirits such as the Rebels Amaretti. 1x Full Sized Bottle ANON Xmas Pudding Spirit. Christmas pudding in a glass. Warming spirit with hints of dark fruits, vanilla and ginger. Serve on the rocks or shake with a dash of cream for a non-alcoholic Bailey's. Heat gently with apple juice for a hot toddy or serve with ginger beer over ice. 1x Full Sized Bottle of Tarquin's Alcohol-Free Gin. Dry with fresh juniper, sweet orange blossom and sea salt resulting in a beautifully smooth citrus freshness and floral notes. Serve with any of your favourite gin mixers such as tonic or in any gin based cocktails.

name: Festive Alcohol-Free Wine Bundle - Hand-Curated For Your Seasonal Wine
description: A specially curated bundle to keep you feeling inspired & full of joy throughout the entire festive season - all with a full glass! This dry, complex and curiously different alcohol-free honey wine is not overly sweet and have the depth to pair perfectly with your Christmas dinner.

name: Festive Cocktail Box - Powerful Drinks To Inspire Through The Festivit
description: Looking for powerful alcohol-free cocktails that actually excite and inspire this festive season? This box is the one for you or a loved one! Filled with dark, fiery, warming drinks to enjoy in front of the fire, to enjoy with loved ones over a meal or to even keep the party going, glass in hand. Your guests are all going to want a taste of these drinks and certainly won't find them on supermarket shelves. Two of these spirits are functional making them perfect for 'socialising season'. Social Elixir, The Mood Maker - utilising plants to elevate your mood and create a blissful feeling with lion's mane, mushroom, yerba mate and damiana. Full-bodied and bittersweet with a curious savoury bite. The PathFinder - distilled from hemp and layered with a complex blend of botanicals including wormwood, angelica root, saffron, ginger, sage and orange peel. What's inside? Full sized bottle of The Pathfinder Hemp & Root Alcohol-Free Spirit Counter Culture Mango, Ginger & Lime Kombucha. Good Koffee - Sparkling Coffee Inspired By Travel. 20cl bottle of Three Spirits Social Elixir Alcohol-Free Spirit Agua De Madre Water Kefir Navas Ginger Garnishes & 20 Page Special Edition Magazine Shipping "Super high quality and delicious blends. I felt super special and taste buds activated. Soooo good. Highly recommend. The alcohol-free spirit is just sublime" Who is this box for? For the adventurous drinker. When you want to find things that really excite the palate. Drinks that become a talking point and the heart of conversation! Drinks you won't have yet tried.

name: Functional Non-Alcoholic Cocktail Bitters - 100+ Servings - Amplify Yo
description: Amplify your non-alcoholic cocktails with a few dashes of OTO cocktail bitters to add extra depth, balance and flavour to your drinks. Made using a botanical blend of plants including cocoa, cinnamon, liquorice, lemongrass & lime. Using the most premium ingredients, while being infused with premium CBD for added calm with every sip. 100+ servings per bottle | 0.69p per use. Natural Ingredients | Sugar Free | Promoted Calm | Made in UK How to use: simply add 2-3 dashes of bitters in any drink including: tonics, non-alcoholic cocktails or coffees. CBD benefits: there have been many benefits associated with CBD including reduced stress & anxiety, better sleep, reduced inflammation and muscle recovery.

name: Hand-Knitted Bottle Hat Toppers - Knitted With Love üß∂
description: As a small brand, JOMO Club can sometimes be a real family affair. When we first launched the club, we introduced the JOMO hand knitted bottle hats. Festive hats to keep your bottles cosy. As we have grown, we've knitted more hats and the knitting has started a year in advance to make sure our members are happy and the JOY continues. They are perfect stocking fillers or the perfect decoration for your table wine this festive season. Meet our knitters? My Grandma, Betty - aged 88 - absolute legend. My Mum, Carole - started knitting to support her wrist recovery when breaking it rollerskating (yes really). My Aunty, Stef - knitting all the way from their home in California. She knits a year in advance and brings them in her case when visiting us. Family friend, Laura - she had FOMO for the JOMO knitting and joined us last year. She recently visited family in Australia and knitted on the plane and on the beach.

name: Hibiscus Aperitif - CROSSIP PURE
description: This one is for the spritz drinkers who like complexity and layers in their drink. Just like all CROSSIP's non-alcoholic spirits, they are unapologetically bold with bitter and herbal notes. Tasting Notes: inspired by Italian aperitivo hour, PURE uses natural botanicals to create a bittersweet classic aperitif that will stand strong in any serve. Serving Suggestions: 0% Spritz using tonic, soda or lemonade. 0% Negroni.

name: Joerg Geiger's Sparkling Alcohol-Free Wine Range
description: Joerg Geiger have a wide selection of alcohol-free drinks curated for all tastes and occasions. These sparkling variations are from their own orchards, each drink includes a selection of unique Swabian MeadowFruit found only in these orchards - meaning you won't find these beautiful flavours elsewhere. From wines that use carefully selected herbs, flowers and spices, to their Virgin Long Drinks refined and flavoured to aromatic perfection, you are about to enter into the world of Joerg Geiger. JOMO Member, Virgin Long Drinks "This is delicious!" Apple, Rose and Mint "We really enjoyed this and would like to order for a family celebration we have coming up."

name: JOMO Club Gift Card
description: This gift card is perfect for a Birthday, Baby Shower, Wedding, Leaving Present, during the Festive Season or to celebrate a sober-versary! Your recipient can then spend it on anything across our store!

name: JUKES Sparkling Red - Alcohol Free Wine Alternative
description: JUKES Sparkling Red. Canned wine alternative

name: Low-Sugar Non-Alcoholic Cocktail Box
description: Many have come to us asking about the sugar in alcohol-free drinks. We always strive to bring drinks and snacks low in sugar, however for those strictly counting the sugar load, we have created a box for you that is all natural and focuses on using as little sugar as possible. This box includes: Full bottle of non-alcoholic spirit Low sugar mixers Low sugar ready to drinks Low sugar snacks Garnishes

name: Mahala Botanical Classic - Triple Distilled 0% Spirit from South Afric
description: Enjoy Mahala's original botanical based spirit in their 0% range curated for the gin lovers. Created using a triple distilled method and 9 foraged natural ingredients native to South Africa. Tasting notes: Using 9 hand sourced botanicals infused under a vacuum to extract flavour, this subtle spirit has delicate spices native to South Africa was a zesty finish. Serving suggestions: create a classic simply with a low sugar, premium tonic and ice with a lemon garnish & sprig of rosemary. Pair with a premium light lemonade and garnish with some peppercorns. Sugar Free | GF | V | Free from alcohol, colourants & artificial flavours.

name: Mediterranean Aperitif - 'Aegean Sky' by New London Light
description: A sip of the Mediterranean and perfect for Spritz lovers or those looking for something sophisticated and different. Tasting Notes: A sophisticated aperitif made with sun soaked citrus and bitter olive Serving Suggestions: 50ml in a wine glass over ice topped with tonic, soda or lemonade. No added sugar | 0% alcohol | vegan friendly | allergen-free | low calorie

name: Monthly, Bi-Monthly or Quarterly JOMO Box üç∏
description: Find Your Perfect JOMO Club Plan. Whether you're looking to discover the latest, most exclusive alcohol free drinks regularly or just occasionally, we cannot wait to welcome you to the club! JOMO Club is so much more than high quality alternatives to alcohol, not found on supermarket shelves, we are a lifestyle and a way to help you relax, unwind and keep your at home drinking rituals, without the booze. What‚Äôs inside each box? A carefully curated box that is different each month filled with alcohol free drinks, mixers, cocktails, snacks, garnishes & a printed members magazine. Full sized bottle of an Artisan brand non-alc spirit (different style each month!) 5+ drinks (range of mixers and ready to drink cocktails) 2 snacks garnishes 20 page members magazine No commitments. Cancel anytime. Pause, skip or change frequency to suit your lifestyle. Tracked, flexible delivery. Paypal | Card | Apple Pay | Klarna

name: Mother Root Ginger | AS SEEN ON DRAGON'S DEN | JUNE SPIRIT OF THE MONT
description: AS SEEN ON DRAGON'S DEN! The ultimate golden hour spritz with a kick for your perfect drinking ritual. Fiery & Fresh. With only 4 ingredients in the bottle, Mother Root is a powerhouse of health ingredients & flavour using Fiery Ginger, A Little Chilli, Blossom Honey & ACV which supports healthy digestion. No Additives | No Preservatives | Award-Winning | Makes 20 Drinks How to enjoy? Simply serve 25ml over ice topped with soda water, tonic water, a citrus based mixer (kombucha or a premium lemonade or orange mixer). Serve with hot water in the morning to give you a natural lift. Any cocktail where you need a bit of a ginger kick! Works well with smoky dark spirits, with bittersweet aperitifs and non-alcoholic gins. When to enjoy? AM: Serve with hot or soda water in morning for a natural pick me up. PM: Serve with lunch to help aid digestion, reduce sugar spikes and give you an afternoon lift without the crash. Evening: The perfect way to unwind after a long day using your favourite mixer. Who would like this? Ginger lovers Bold and punchy flavours Looking for serves without sugar Looking at drinks that are as natural as possible without a long list of ingredients

name: Naesip Munro - Scottish Gooseberry, Juniper & Botanical - APRIL FEATUR
description: This botanical non alcoholic spirit, Naesip, is crafted in Scotland combining Scottish gooseberry, juniper, and botanical extracts. Created in small batches for quality and flavour every time. Tasting notes: a wonderfully bitter, complex alcohol-free spirit combining juniper, Scottish gooseberry and botanicals for a distinct flavour profile that is refreshing and leaves you wanting more. Serving suggestions: serve over ice with light tonic or with a premium lemonade for a slightly less bitter serve. Pair in any gin-based cocktail. Low in calories | free from added sugar & artificial colourings | non-alcoholic Esteemed by sommeliers, chefs, and food critics.

name: Natural Berry Based Spirit - New London Light Midnight Sun
description: A totally unique drink like no other. Perfect for Spring sipping paired simply with a tonic, soda, water kefir or kombucha. Inspired by the Nordic regions to create a complex flavour profile Tasting Notes: Hand-picked seaberries and elderberries combined with kelp and pine to create a complex and naturally sweet flavour. Serving Suggestions: serve with a light tonic, soda, dry kombucha or water kefir. We enjoy this with light mixers as the spirit holds its own flavour or with a light red fruit/berry mixer.

name: New London Light ‚ÄúFirst Light‚Äù Alcohol-Free Gin
description: New London Light‚Äôs ‚ÄúFirst Light‚Äù is inspired by gin. Tasting notes: a bold refreshing non-alcoholic spirit using classic ingredients such as dry juniper, bright citrus and zesty ginger. Serving suggestions: serve simply with tonic or use in gin based cocktails- a versatile alcohol-free spirit! Sugar - 0g

name: New Years Eve | Alcohol-Free Celebration Bundle
description: We want to make sure you are celebrating, toasting, dancing & singing the whole night through into 2026 with a full glass! What's inside the bundle? Bottle of NINO Ruby. Bold, vibrant & complex. A perfect NYE Dinner serve. Bottle of NINO Charly. Golden, floral & elegant. Bottle of DIVIN's Sparkling Chenin. Beautiful Blanc de Blancs crafted from Chenin Blanc from the Loire Valley, France. Bottle of Wednesday's Domaine Eclat. Sparkling White from the historic La Mancha region of Central Spain. Notes of elderflower, ginger and lemon. This is the drink to celebrates life's moments.

name: NINO Drinks | Lily, Ruby or Charly | FT JOMO WINE CLUB
description: Lily. This sparkling tea brings brightness to any moment. Crafted in Switzerland from a blend of premium teas, Lily is great for aperitifs, food pairings and celebrations. Aroma: A lively bouquet of green apple, citrus zest, and elderflower. Palate: Crisp, dry profile with citrus brightness and clear acidity. Food pairing: Seafood, mild cheeses, or light Asian-inspired dishes. Awarded GOLD at the 2025 World Alcohol-Free Awards. Ruby. Bold, vibrant and beautifully complex. Coral red and fine elegant bubbles. Palate: Red berries, hibiscus and a touch of jasmine. Delicately fruity with a lift of citrus zest and floral undertones. Full-bodied yet refreshing. Food Pairing: umami-rich dishes, grilled vegetables or creamy cheeses. Charly. Golden, floral & elegant. Sparkling tea - depth without heaviness. Layered and expressive. Palate: Jasmine, elderflower and ripe quince with fine, delicate bubbles and a warm smooth finish. Food Pairing: seafood, roasted vegetables or creamy pasta dishes.

name: Non-Alcoholic Amaretto - Rebels 0.0% - JOMO Club
description: "I occasionally would drink alcoholic amaretto but stayed away from the alcohol-free one as I thought it would be too sweet. I am so glad I got to try it, it has a lovely finish and isn't overly sweet at all" Alcohol-free amaretti tasting notes: sweet marzipan-almond notes, a vanilla cherry aroma and balanced with some subtly spiced notes. Serving suggestions: a classic non-alcoholic amaretto sour. Allergen free, vegan, 0% alcohol, natural botanicals.

name: Non-Alcoholic Aperitif - Everleaf Forest - MAY SPIRIT OF THE MONTH
description: Showcased as the headline spirit in JOMO Club's May Box, this is JOMO's May spirit of the month! A bittersweet blend of sustainably sourced, premium botanicals and extracts to capture the long lasting, complex aperitif of Everleaf Forest. Tasting Notes: a super complex, sophisticated, unique spirit with notes of saffron, Madagascan vanilla and honeyed orange blossom. Serving Suggestions: enjoy with tonic or ginger ale as a spritz over ice with a wedge of orange.

name: Non-Alcoholic Sparkling Honey Wine - Bemuse Collection - Bee Inspired
description: Bemuse's range of sparkling honey wine is dry, complex and curiously different. Using natural fermentation to bring complexity without sickly sweetness, this range is perfect for that 'wine moment' when you want to raise a glass with something unique and of course non-alcoholic. Bee inspired to drink differently. Wild Raspberry Rose. Elegant and delicate using floral English meadow borage honey, blended with wild raspberry and rose petals. Pairings & Serve. Fish, salads and light cheeses. Serve chilled in a flute. Pomona Brut. Subtly spiced using apple blossom honey, cardamom, ginger and bitter orange peel. Pairings & Serve. Strong cheeses, spicy dishes and a Sunday roast. Drink solo or as a cocktail mixer garnishes with a sprig of thyme. Calluna Brut. Herbaceous and aromatic using wild heather honey with tarragon, thai basil and zesty hops. Pairings & Serve. Cheese, salads and roast chicken. Serve on its own or as a cocktail base using a sprig of rosemary. Origo Original Brut. Crisp and fresh using floral spring wildflower honey, zesty citrus and aromatic hops. Pairings & Serve. Seafood, al fresco lunches and canap√©s. Serve chilled in a flute.

name: Nordic Aperitif - Franka Drinks - Just Landed in the UK
description: Franka is a family-run Swedish brand who craft their alcohol-free spirit in small batches using bold flavours inspired by the Nordic landscape. Tasting notes: A Bold, bitter-sweet aperitif packed with flavour created to awaken the palate Crafted for aperitivo hour. Serving suggestions: Small Batch | Natural Ingredients | Winning Gold 2025 World Alcohol-Free Awards

name: OFFER NORMALLY ¬£58 - Premium English Lager - All In Beer - 24 Cans
description: 24 cans of artisan brand, All In Beer. Premium English Lager crafted by amazing Founder, George. A great gift or perfect for Festive sipping. *On sale as listed BBD December 2025.

name: Parent-To-Be Box - Alcohol-Free Cocktail Gift
description: When you are growing and caring for an unborn human, alcohol is removed from the equation. We understand that part completely, but what we don‚Äôt understand is why you should be left for 9+ months without a special drink that you truly enjoy. Whether to feel included, to treat yourself or because you just can‚Äôt face water or sugary drinks for months, we have you covered with this box. Perfect for a baby shower gift or a treat for yourself. Please find our 6/12 month gift options too for a longer gift. What is in the box? *all safe for pregnancy Full sized bottle of alcohol-free spirit Mixers and garnishes Ready-to-serve drinks Snacks Gift card - optional Free delivery

name: Pentire Coastal Spritz - Non-Alcoholic Aperitif - AUGUST'S FEATURED SP
description: Using coastal botanicals present in all Pentire spirits, this aperitif is curated along with blood orange, sea rosemary and oakwood. Low in calories and 100% plant based. Tasting notes: a bittersweet aperitif with natural bitterness and refreshing coastal tones. Serving suggestions: 50ml Pentire Coastal over ice in a wine glass topped with light tonic or soda. Garnish with a wedge of orange or a bay leaf. Also great in a Negroni.

name: Pentire Ready To Drink Coastal Spritz - 4x 200ml Cans - Non-Alcoholic
description: Canned, expertly crafted non-alcoholic cocktails for when you want a perfect non-alc cocktail without the hassle. This canned cocktail is perfect for those who like bitter flavours found in classic aperitifs. 4x cans expertly crafted Coastal Spritz cocktails. Tasting notes: Pentire's coastal botanicals are blended with blood orange, sea rosemary and oakwood to create a balance of natural bitterness with refreshing coastal tones. Serving suggestions: cold out the can or over ice in a wine glass with a wedge of orange. Enjoy on the go, at dinner parties, on your Winter adventures or for at home sipping as a healthy ritual or to impress your guests (they don't have to know it's already made for you!)

name: Pentire Ready To Drink Margarita's - 4x 200ml Cans
description: Discover & enjoy Pentire's best selling ready to drink Margarita's. An expertly curated cocktail to bring on the go, to dinner parties, on your Winter adventures or for at home sipping as you introduce healthy rituals or want to impress guests. Tasting notes: Pentire's coastal botanicals blended with lime, agave, sea salt and a dash of Mexican chilli to create a zingy and fresh Margarita Serving suggestions: serve cold out the can or in a salt rimmed glass. 4x 200ml ready to drink cans
